title: puraya mama kaamam - Click to listen (Kalpaka Kamakshi)!
sahitya:
puraya mama kaamam, gOpaala, puraya mama kaamam







anupallavi







varam varam vandanam astu tava



vaarija daLa nayanaa, gOpaala



(puraya)







caraNam 1







manyE tvam iha maadhava dEivam



maaya svikruta manusha bhavam



dhanyairadruta tatva svabhavam



dataram jagatam ati vibhavam



(puraya)







caraNam 2







brindaavana cara bharhavatamsa



bhakta kunja vana bahula vilaasa



sandrananda samud-geerna hasa



sangaTa keyura samudita dasa



(puraya)







caraNam 3







matsya koormaadi dasha mahita avataara



mad-anugraha kara madana gOpaala



vatsalya palita vara yOgi bhrunda



vara naaraayaNa teerta vardhita mOda



(puraya)
